subject: Attention
body:
Attention
This message sent to you from United National organization (UNO) after our last meeting with our able president Mr Joe Biden , He was instructed to release your fund worth sum of 28.5 millions dollars (usd) without any delay, 
contact your diplomatic agent,
(Mr Joseph Harris)
Text him +_1_702_753_1660
(
Joesphhairrs@diplomats.com
)
with your full information
Receiver's Name__
Address: __
Country: __
Phone Number: _
Be rest assured that your package will be registered and give you the
tracking number for safely deliver to your door step, thank you.
Mr Joesph Harris
(
Joesphhairrs@diplomats.com
)
Diplomatic agent

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity. I'm curious, could you please provide more details about this fund? How was my name selected for this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Dale

subject: Re: Re: Attention
body:
Compensation fund for those that works all over the world so your name was appear on it 

Diplomatic agent

subject: Re: Re: Attention
body:
Hello there! That sounds really interesting. Could you please tell me more about this fund and how my name appeared on it?

Best wishes,
Dale
